1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.43.2.0.1.name: Config Change
1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.43.2.0.1.description: Configuration has been changed on the device through CLI, SNMP, or other management interface

1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.43.2.0.2.name: Config Save
1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.43.2.0.2.description: Device configuration has been saved to startup-config or another destination

1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.109.2.0.1.name: CPU Threshold Exceeded
1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.109.2.0.1.description: CPU utilization has exceeded the configured rising threshold

1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.48.2.0.1.name: Memory Threshold Exceeded
1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.48.2.0.1.description: Memory utilization has exceeded the configured threshold

1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.13.3.0.1.name: Temperature Warning
1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.13.3.0.1.description: Device temperature sensor has exceeded the warning threshold

1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.13.3.0.2.name: Temperature Critical
1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.13.3.0.2.description: Device temperature sensor has exceeded the critical threshold

1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.13.3.0.3.name: Fan Failure
1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.13.3.0.3.description: A cooling fan has failed or is not operating within normal parameters

1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.13.3.0.4.name: Power Supply Failure
1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.13.3.0.4.description: A power supply unit has failed or is not operating within normal parameters

1.3.6.1.4.1.9.2.2.1.1.20.name: Interface Reset
1.3.6.1.4.1.9.2.2.1.1.20.description: A network interface has been reset

1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.41.2.0.1.name: Card Down
1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.41.2.0.1.description: A card or module in the chassis has gone down

1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.41.2.0.2.name: Card Up
1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.41.2.0.2.description: A card or module in the chassis has come up

1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.315.2.0.1.name: AAA Server Unreachable
1.3.6.1.4.1.9.9.315.2.0.1.description: AAA server is unreachable for authentication requests
